document_data.name: Briarsting
document_data.home: [[City of the Dead (Waterdeep)|City of the Dead]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Briarsting''' was a [[thorn (fey)|thorn]] who was tasked with guarding the tomb of a long-dead [[druid]] in [[Waterdeep|Waterdeep's]] [[City of the Dead (Waterdeep)|City of the Dead]].
document_data.Relationships: The thorn was friends with and often rode a semi-sentient [[Topiary guardian|topiary dragon]] with whom he guarded the druid's tomb.
document_data.History: Around [[1467 DR|1467]]â€“[[1479 DR]], Briarsting helped [[Sophraea Carver]] undo the curse that [[Dorgar Adarbrent]] placed on tombs in the graveyard.
